Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Espahotel Gran Via 65, you'll be centrally located in Madrid, steps from Lope de Vega Theatre and Plaza de Espana. This apartment is close to Plaza Mayor and Prado Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. 32-inch LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Dining
Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and a safe deposit box at the front desk.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2:00 PM Check-out time is noon
Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.


Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

With a stay at Espahotel Gran Via 65, you'll be centrally located in Madrid, steps from Lope de Vega Theatre and Plaza de Espana. This apartment is close to Plaza Mayor and Prado Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Lope de Vega Theatre - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Plaza de Espana - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Spanish Senate - 0.2 km / 0.2 mi
Royal Monastery of the Incarnation - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Sabatini Gardens - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Cerralbo Museum - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Teatro Alfil - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Plaza de Callao - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Royal Theatre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Plaza de Isabel II - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Plaza de Oriente - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Museo Municipal de Arte Contemporaneo - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Convent of las Comendadoras de Santiago - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Mosaic International Institute - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Convent de las Descalzas Reales - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi

The preferred airport for Espahotel Gran Via 65 is Madrid (MAD-Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas) - 13 km / 8.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
